price: 119. En jullie (zullen) daar niet aan dorst lijden noch van de hitte van de zon.”
arabic: وَأَنَّكَ لَا تَظۡمَؤُاْ فِيهَا وَلَا تَضۡحَىٰ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-annaka lā taẓma-u fīhā walā taḍḥā
